mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADLINK_CLICK_STATUS (STATS_DTTM, PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, SITE_CODE, MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, ADVRTS_RCMD_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE_DETAIL, ADVRTS_AMT, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTTM) VALUES (#{yyyymmdd}, #{pltfom_tp_code}, #{advrts_prdt_code}, #{advrts_tp_code}, #{site_code}, #{media_script_no}, #{advrts_rcmd_tp_code}, #{advrts_tp_code_detail}, #{advrts_amt}, 'recommend_gateway', now())

INSERT INTO ADLINK_RCD_STATUS (STATS_DTTM, PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, SITE_CODE, MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, ADVRTS_RCMD_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE_DETAIL, TOT_EPRS_CNT, CLICK_CNT, ADVRTS_AMT, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTTM) VALUES (#{yyyymmdd}, #{pltfom_tp_code}, #{advrts_prdt_code}, #{advrts_tp_code}, #{site_code}, #{media_script_no}, #{advrts_rcmd_tp_code}, #{advrts_tp_code_detail}, #{tot_eprs_cnt}, #{click_cnt}, #{advrts_amt}, 'recommend_gateway', now())

INSERT INTO MOB_CNVRS_STATS (STATS_DTTM, PLTFOM_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_PRDT_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE, SITE_CODE, MEDIA_SCRIPT_NO, ADVRTS_RCMD_TP_CODE, ADVRTS_TP_CODE_DETAIL, TOT_EPRS_CNT, CLICK_CNT, ADVRTS_AMT, REG_USER_ID, REG_DTTM) VALUES (#{yyyymmdd}, #{pltfom_tp_code}, #{advrts_prdt_code}, #{advrts_tp_code}, #{site_code}, #{media_script_no}, #{advrts_rcmd_tp_code}, #{advrts_tp_code_detail}, #{tot_eprs_cnt}, #{click_cnt}, #{advrts_amt}, 'recommend_gateway', now())
